document.full_text: production at toyota motor corp  and honda motor co  is likely to recover more quickly than initially feared after japan's massive earthquake wreaked havoc with their supply chains and halved output in april.
document.title: toyota and honda global output halves in april after quake
lines_and_colors: production at toyota motor corp  and honda motor co  is likely to recover more quickly than initially feared after japan's massive earthquake wreaked havoc with their supply chains and halved output in april.
